resources.string: This \'A Book\' application is developed only for attendance purpose. The complete process of the application is described : After installation you have to complete the registration by valid email address,phone number and password. An email is sent to your given email address which contains your registration information. You should store these information to get back your data next time. If email is deleted then you can resend it from setting. After registration you must create the new attendance type to count the attendance as a new user. Then you can count attendance if you want. After counting attendance per day you can see total list from menu icon three. By clicking icon four you can see the percentage of your counted attendance. Total control of your application is in setting. In setting, first button is for resending your backup information. Second button is for creating another existing attendance type. You create same attendance type without time waste. Third button is for editing/deleting any person. Four number button is for deleting specific attendance. Five number button is for deleting specific attendance. Six number button is for deleting all counted attendance. from your application. Seven number button is to reset your application. N.B : Without internet connection you can create and count attendance but to complete other operation you have connect internet.
